but it broke. Tim was sad because his toy was broken.
Tim's mom said, "Let's go to the doctor to fix your toy." They went to the doctor, and the doctor took an x-ray of the broken toy car. Tim was very curious about the x-ray. He looked at the picture and saw something inside the toy car.
The doctor said, "Look, there is a key inside your toy car!" Tim was so surprised! He never knew there was a key inside his toy car. The doctor took the key out, and Tim's toy car was fixed. Tim was happy again.

"What happened here?" Mom asks.
Tom and Jen tell her what happened. They say they are sorry. They hug Mom.
Mom hugs them back. She is not angry. She is glad they are sorry. She says they can watch TV again, but they have to share. They have to take turns. They have to be nice.
